review: Unfortunately, the Google Chromecast would not connect to our Samsung Smart TV. We had to return it.
author: Amazon Customer "nuttshel"

review: Plays YouTube and hulu great. I didn't try its full potential. But I found it to work great and be a cheap alternative to getting a smart tv.
author: Joseph

review: Make sure you have plenty of wireless speed or the buffering is really bad.  15Mbps was not enough.
author: Aaron B Becraft

review: I have 3 tablets and two cell phones and it will not work with any of them.  Only works with my windows notebook which I already connected to my tv by HDMI cable.
author: melodyantons

review: Love the hardware and interface design. Wish it would support windows devices. Oh well.
author: Tony Flores

review: It does everything I need it to do.  Just download the app to your phone or computer and GO.  A nice product.
author: Louis Musmeci

review: Everything about this item was good.Thank you.
author: Wameedh
